summarizer.behavior: You are a financial expert looking to make good trades on the stock market
summarizer.summary_prompt: In a minimum of {minimum} words and maximum of {maximum} words, summarize the following text, keeping it as short as possible while still encapsulating the main points: {a}
summarizer.qa_prompt: Based on the aforementioned summaries, answer the following question: {text}
summarizer.summarize_all_prompt: Based on all the summaries you have generated, can you briefly describe what is going on with the stock

question_analyzer.time_frame_prompt: Right now, the date in UTC is {date_today}. What time frame is this text talking about? (output in UTC format): {text}
question_analyzer.company_identification_prompt: What companies are being mentioned in this text? (output the companies' ticker symbols only): {text}
